overview:
I’m passionate about the intersection between technology, design and business.

Before forming Yoink, I co-founded Bonobo - a leading iPhone and web agency that cultivates ideas and successfully takes them to market. Bonobo applications have been featured in the New York Times and CNN as well as topping the App Store charts in several countries, both paid and free. Bonobo is a self funded company and was nominated for a 2010 Webby Award.

Prior to Bonobo, I was Product Manager at Simmersion where I identified an opportunity to apply their unique 3D technology for the emerging virtual world space. In this role I co-invented patented technology (Australia, USA). I drove their business analysis, product management, marketing, business development and played a key role in capital raising of $1.9m in 2008.
